long_description: Giro Whynd Bike Shoes for women are ready for indoor spin class or recreational cycling outdoors, with their athletic-inspired lace-up styling in mesh and synthetic leather. Mesh and microfiber uppers are supportive and breathable; laces feature a keeper strap. Recessed cleat design and rubber walking zones enhance your stride off the bike. Molded SPD-compatible shank of the Giro Whynd Bike Shoes has an optimized cleat zone. Molded EVA footbed offers medium arch support and an antimicrobial treatment.
short_description: Giro Whynd Bike Shoes for women are ready for indoor spin class or recreational cycling outdoors, with their athletic-inspired lace-up styling in mesh and synthetic leather.
